bibl.title: Sophocles. [III]. Fragments.
bibl.note: I [Ajax to Oedipus Tyrannus], 1994; - II [Antigone to Oedipus at Colonus], 1994. - This collection includes those fragments of which at least one entire verse, or two connected half-verses, is preserved. The numbering is that of Tr.G.F. IV.
bibl.seg: LLOYD-JONES Hugh (Edited and Translated by), Sophocles. [III]. Fragments. (The Loeb Classical Library. 483.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1996, 8Â°, vii-434 pp. ISBN 0-674-99532-5.

I [Ajax to Oedipus Tyrannus], 1994; - II [Antigone to Oedipus at Colonus], 1994. - This collection includes those fragments of which at least one entire verse, or two connected half-verses, is preserved. The numbering is that of Tr.G.F. IV.
C.R. par E.M. Craik, CR N.S., 48 (1998) pp. 170-171. - P.E. Easterling, JHS 118 (1998) pp. 212-213.
